title: Professor List
description: A List of all the professors in the system

Professors.description: The Array of all Professor Data, I would like this label for better readability on the front-end code but am open to disucssion on this

title: Professors
description: The Array of all Professor Data

Department.description: What Department the professor is in, there can only be one value in this section

Email.description: The UVic work email that is registered to the professor, (In the format of email@uvic.ca) REQIURED: only one period and @ symbol

First_Name.description: the professors first name, it can contain only letters and spaces

Last_Name.description: the professors last name, it can contain only letters and spaces

Is_Teaching.description: A boolean to express if the professor is current employeed by the university in a teaching role (I.E we can schedule them and we want input from them)

Is_PENG.description: A boolean to express if the professor is authorized to teach PENG courses

UUID.description: ID for this professor used to communicate within the system and generated by the backend
